response.body:
UI form to call a backend API like http://localhost:9090/api/mappings/save instead of directly posting to /updateMock.
This way:
	•	All request/response mappings are saved into a mappings/ folder as JSON files (WireMock’s style).
	•	WireMock serves responses from those files.
	•	Your UI → backend API → mapping file update → WireMock picks it up.
